scripts.build: mkdir -p build && react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --dev=true --bundle-output build/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ../app/src/main/res/
scripts.build:prod: mkdir -p build && react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --dev=false --bundle-output build/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ../app/src/main/res/
